item.title: Implications on Regulation and Governance of Blockchain-based Finance
item.description: Disclaimer First, please note that the opinions presented here belong to myself and don’t represent the organizations to which I belong. Major goals for financial regulators The primary goals of financial regulators are to maintain financial stability, protect investors and consumers, and prevent financial crimes. These goals are public interests and are needed to be achieved regardless of the technology used in the financial systems. These goals are our own, but also the goals of general society.
